name: La Belle Lucie :: SC
description:
Solitaire Connection offers you select classic favorites and original games as iPad and iPhone apps with the following distinguishing features:

- Undisturbed user privacy:
* Zero tracking of any kind
* No reminders for ratings or reviews
- Automatic progress save and restore
- Bonus points for skillful play
- Unlimited Undo/Redo
- Choice of hand-picked card backs and background colors
- Access to extended selection of solitaire games online
